verbose_text: This is further supported by the fact that comparable amounts of IFN-gamma were detected in the BAL fluid of OVA / alum immunized WT and Cblb -/- mice or BALB/c nude mice that received naive CD4 + T cells from WT and Cblb -/- mice (XREF_FIG), because the lower threshold should also lead to enhanced IFN-gamma in the BAL fluid.
